name: Khyati
greetingText: I really like you, when you smile, btw!
wishText: I wish I could be with you to wish you this year, with something even more special! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Thank your for blah blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
